nodes.description: 1994年阿根廷布宜诺斯艾利斯AMIA犹太慈善中心遭爆炸袭击，造成85人死亡
nodes.support_text: The bombing of the Argentine-Israelite Mutual Aid (AMIA) organization killed 85 people, the deadliest attack of its kind on Argentine soil.

nodes.description: 2012年阿根廷与伊朗签署备忘录，设立联合调查委员会
nodes.support_text: Kirchner, her former foreign minister Hector Timerman and others in her 2007-2015 administration are accused of abuse of power and obstruction for signing a memorandum of understanding with Iran in 2012 that would have established a 'truth commission' to investigate the bombing.

nodes.description: 2014年阿根廷法院裁定与伊朗的联合调查协议违宪
nodes.support_text: In 2014, an Argentine court declared the agreement to be unconstitutional.

nodes.description: 2015年检察官Alberto Nisman以涉嫌包庇伊朗为由对基什内尔等提起指控
nodes.support_text: The case against them was opened in January 2015, on the basis of charges brought by Alberto Nisman, a prosecutor who was found dead in mysterious circumstances four days later.

nodes.description: 2015年1月Nisman提出指控四天后离奇死亡，尸检确认遭谋杀
nodes.support_text: Nisman proposed charges four days later and was found dead in mysterious circumstances. A judge recently ruled that Nisman was murdered and did not commit suicide.

nodes.description: 2016年8月法官Claudio Bonadio重启案件调查
nodes.support_text: While the case languished after Nisman’s death, but Bonadio reactivated it in August 2016.

nodes.description: 2016年案件由初级法院转交上级法院进行公开审理
nodes.support_text: Judge Claudio Bonadio has closed the investigative phase of the case, referring it to a higher level court for a public trial.

nodes.description: 基什内尔等被正式起诉涉嫌滥用职权包庇伊朗
nodes.support_text: Kirchner, her former foreign minister Hector Timerman and others in her 2007-2015 administration are accused of abuse of power and obstruction...

nodes.description: 基什内尔否认指控并接受公开审判以自证清白
nodes.support_text: Kirchner, who has denounced the charges against her as a political persecution, nonetheless has said she welcomes an open trial to prove her innocence.

nodes.description: 伊朗官方持续否认参与1994年AMIA爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: Iran, for its part, has denied involvement in the AMIA attack.

nodes.description: 备忘录试图掩盖伊朗和黑塞堡在袭击中的参与
nodes.support_text: the memorandum of understanding tried to cover up Iran and Hezbollah's involvement in the attack

nodes.description: 基尔纳克谴责对她的指控
基尔纳克接受伊朗石油和贸易利益
nodes.support_text: 基尔纳克接受石油和贸易利益

nodes.description: 基尔纳克批准交易以使AMIA bombing嫌疑人逃避起诉
nodes.support_text: 基尔纳克批准交易以使AMIA bombing嫌疑人逃避起诉

nodes.description: 交易使AMIA bombing嫌疑人规避起诉
nodes.support_text: 交易使AMIA bombing嫌疑人规避起诉

nodes.description: AMIA bombing嫌疑人通过交易规避起诉
nodes.support_text: AMIA bombing嫌疑人通过交易规避起诉

edges.support_text: The bombing of the Argentine-Israelite Mutual Aid (AMIA) organization killed 85 people, the deadliest attack of its kind on Argentine soil.
In 2014, an Argentine court declared the agreement to be unconstitutional.
Iran, for its part, has denied involvement in the AMIA attack.
the memorandum of understanding signed in 2012 aimed to obscure Iran and Hezbollah's participation in the AMIA bombing
Nisman proposed charges four days later and was found dead in mysterious circumstances.
While the case languished after Nisman’s death, but Bonadio reactivated it in August 2016.
Judge Claudio Bonadio has closed the investigative phase of the case, referring it to a higher level court for a public trial.
Kirchner, her former foreign minister Hector Timerman and others in her 2007-2015 administration are accused of abuse of power and obstruction...
Kirchner, who has denounced the charges against her as a political persecution, nonetheless has said she welcomes an open trial to prove her innocence.
